name: Slow Burn
tagline: A district attorney is involved in a 24-hour showdown with a gang leader and is, at the same time, being manipulated by an attractive assistant district attorney and a cryptic stranger.

name: Repentance
tagline: A successful author and spiritual advisor takes on a troubled man as a client, completely unaware that the man's fixation on his mother's death will soon put his life in jeopardy.

name: Bee Season
tagline: A wife and mother begins a downward emotional spiral, as her husband avoids their collapsing marriage by immersing himself in his 11 year-old daughter's quest to become a spelling bee champion.

name: I Capture the Castle
tagline: A love story set in 1930s England that follows 17-year-old Cassandra Mortmain, and the fortunes of her eccentric family, struggling to survive in a decaying English castle.

name: Find Me Guilty
tagline: Based on the true story of Jack DiNorscio, a mobster who defended himself in court for what would be the longest mafia trial in U.S. history.

name: Festival Express
tagline: The filmed account of a large Canadian rock festival train tour.

name: Housefull
tagline: Believing himself to be a jinx and bringing bad luck upon himself and others, a man attempts to find true love, but ends up in very complicated relationships.

name: The Lords of Salem
tagline: Heidi, a radio DJ, is sent a box containing a record -- a "gift from the Lords." The sounds within the grooves trigger flashbacks of her town's violent past. Is Heidi going mad, or are the Lords back to take revenge on Salem, Massachusetts?

name: Romeo & Juliet
tagline: Romeo and Juliet secretly wed despite the sworn contempt their families hold for each another. It is not long, however, before a chain of fateful events changes the lives of both families forever.

name: The Other Son
tagline: Two young men, one Israeli and one Palestinian, discover they were accidentally switched at birth.

name: American Movie
tagline: Documentary about an aspiring filmmaker's attempts to finance his dream project by finally completing the low-budget horror film he abandoned years before.

name: The Final Season
tagline: Kent Stock disrupts his life to become coach of the Norway High School baseball team and try to lead them to victory.

name: Heights
tagline: Spanning twenty-four hours, Heights follows five New Yorkers challenged to choose their destiny before the sun comes up the next day.

name: Still Mine
tagline: An elderly couple fight against local authorities in rural New Brunswick to build their final home.

name: Nightwatch
tagline: Ewan McGregor plays a law student who takes a job as a night watchman at a morgue. He begins to discover clues that implicate him as the suspect of a serial of murders.

name: Ek Main Aur Ekk Tu
tagline: A few drinks too many leads an uptight architect and quick-witted hairstylist to marry in Las Vegas. Can a mistake lead to friendship and love?

name: Get Real
tagline: A tenderly romantic coming-of-age story as two boys in a British school fall in love.

name: Infamous
tagline: While researching his book In Cold Blood, writer Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

name: Nightflyers
tagline: Professor hires a spaceship to get to the source of weird signals from deep space. The trip is cut short however when the ship's computer gets jealous because the captain is in love with one of the female passengers and it gets homicidal.

name: Living in Oblivion
tagline: Film about filmmaking. It takes place during one day on set of non-budget movie. Ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers.

name: Miracle Mile
tagline: A young man hears a chance phone call telling him that a nuclear war has started and missiles will hit his city in 70 minutes.

name: L.I.E.
tagline: A 15-year-old Long Island boy loses everything and everyone he knows, soon becoming involved in a relationship with a much older man.

name: In the Shadow of the Moon
tagline: The surviving crew members from NASA's Apollo missions tell their story in their own words.

name: Yoo-Hoo, Mrs. Goldberg
tagline: The story of the actress, writer, and broadcasting pioneer Gertrude Berg.

name: Golmaal 3
tagline: In Goa, Pritam meets his love Geeta after many years. They decide to get married but the feud between their respective children creates tension in their marriage.

name: 24 Hour Party People
tagline: In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.

name: The Thief
tagline: A woman meets a man who isn't the right man for her - but she hasn't realised it yet...

name: Fading Gigolo
tagline: Fioravante decides to become a professional Don Juan as a way of making money to help his cash-strapped friend, Murray. With Murray acting as his "manager", the duo quickly finds themselves caught up in the crosscurrents of love and money.

name: The Deep Blue Sea
tagline: The wife of a British Judge is caught in a self-destructive love affair with a Royal Air Force pilot.

name: Kai po che!
tagline: Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.

name: The Whistleblower
tagline: A drama based on the experiences of Kathryn Bolkovac, a Nebraska cop who served as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia and outed the U.N. for covering up a sex scandal.

name: The Story of Vernon and Irene Castle
tagline: This is the film version of Vernon and Irene Castle, sensational ballroom dancers prior to World War I.

name: Street Smart
tagline: A New York journalist lies when his fake story about a pimp describes a real pimp up for murder.

name: Groove
tagline: An inside look into one night in the San Francisco underground rave scene.

name: Chakde! India
tagline: The story of a hockey player who returns to the game as a coach of a women's hockey team.

name: Mother and Child
tagline: A drama centered around three women: A 50-year-old woman, the daughter she gave up for adoption 35 years ago, and an African American woman looking to adopt a child of her own.

name: Tae Guk Gi: The Brotherhood of War
tagline: A drama about the fate of brothers forced to fight in the Korean War.

name: The Messenger
tagline: An American soldier struggles with an ethical dilemma when he becomes involved with a widow of a fallen officer.

name: Heathers
tagline: A girl who half-heartedly tries to be part of the "in crowd" of her school meets a rebel who teaches her a more devious way to play social politics; killing the popular kids.

name: The U.S. vs. John Lennon
tagline: A documentary on the life of John Lennon, with a focus on the time in his life when he transformed from a musician into an antiwar activist.

name: Silk
tagline: The story of a married silkworm merchant-turned-smuggler in 19th century France traveling to Japan for his town's supply of silkworms after a disease wipes out their African supply. During his stay in Japan, he becomes obsessed with the concubine of a local baron.

name: Eklavya: The Royal Guard
tagline: As the kingdom of Devigarh comes apart at the seams, an aging bodyguard attempts to protect the Royal Family, as well as keep its darkest secrets from ever coming to light.

name: Kafka
tagline: Writer Franz Kafka works during the day at an insurance company where events lead him to discover a mysterious underground society with strange suppressive goals.

name: Jitterbugs
tagline: The boys team up with a likable con man to help a pretty singer's mother who's been taken in by swindlers.

name: The Book of Mormon Movie, Volume 1: The Journey
Heart of Dixie
tagline: Three young sorority women try to find love with potential men, while worrying about changes in their way of life when integration begins at their college in 1957 segregated Alabama.

name: The Longshot
tagline: Four losers borrow money from gangsters to bet on a "sure thing", but lose. The gangsters go after them to get their money.

name: Paper Clips
tagline: As a part of their study of the Holocaust, the children of the Whitwell, TN Middle School try to collect 6 million paper clips representing the 6 million Jews killed by the Nazis.

name: Made in Dagenham
tagline: A dramatization of the 1968 strike at the Ford Dagenham car plant, where female workers walked out in protest against sexual discrimination.

name: Swimming to Cambodia
tagline: Spalding Gray tells about his participation in the film, "The Killing Fields" & the background story about the troubles of Cambodia.

name: The Perfect Game
tagline: Based on a true story, a group of boys from Monterrey, Mexico who become the first non-U.S. team to win the Little League World Series.

name: What Just Happened
tagline: Two weeks in the life of a fading Hollywood producer who's having a rough time trying to get his new picture made.

name: Wired
tagline: The ghost of John Belushi looks back on his troubled life and career, while journalist Bob Woodward researches Belushi's life as he prepares to write a book about the late comic actor.

name: 84 Charing Cross Road
tagline: True story of a transatlantic business correspondence about used books that developed into a close friendship.

name: Scream
tagline: A group of friends on a rafting trip down a river stop in at an old ghost town to spend the night. Soon their rafts disappear, and then they begin to be eliminated one by one by a mysterious killer.

name: Woman Thou Art Loosed: On the 7th Day
tagline: The Ames' seem to have built the perfect life until their six year old daughter is kidnapped; over the course of seven days they begin to uncover secrets about their past that could rip their marriage and lives apart.

name: The Machinist
tagline: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

name: A Price Above Rubies
tagline: About a young woman who is married to a devout Jew and the problems that trouble their marriage because of the woman wanting something more out of her life

name: Sugar
tagline: Dominican baseball star Miguel "Sugar" Santos is recruited to play in the U.S. minor-leagues.

name: Crush
tagline: Three female friends behave badly.

name: Sordid Lives
tagline: As three generations of a family in a small Texas town gather for a funeral, we learn the hilarious, sad, trashy truth of the "Sordid Lives."

name: Tees Maar Khan
tagline: Posing as a movie producer, a robber cons an entire village to help him rob a treasure-laden train.

name: Blood and Wine
tagline: A man who has failed as a father and husband commits a heist to make money for his fledging business, but things become complicated when his wife interferes.

name: Respiro
tagline: On an impoverished Italian island, a free-spirited woman is accused of madness by townspeople fed up with her antics.

name: When Did You Last See Your Father?
tagline: The story of a son's conflicting memories of his dying father.

name: Dead Man
tagline: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange North American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.
